title: Riak Office Hours Happening Thursday In New York City
description:
Sean Cribbs, Basho Developer Advocate and maintainer of Ripple, will be in New York City this Thursday, so we’re going to hold some Riak Office Hours. Here are the official details:

  • When: Thursday, August 18, from 2-5 Eastern
  • Where: General Assembly – 902 Broadway, 4TH Floor, New York, NY 10010
  • How: After you sign in at the front desk you’ll be directed to Seminar Room 2
  • Who Should Attend: Anyone who wants to talk Riak, databases, use cases, Erlang, open source, etc.

A special thanks is owed to Charlie Robbins, Paolo Fragomeni, and the rest of the team at Nodejitsu, and everyone at General Assembly for giving us the space to make this happen.

Shoot an email to sean@basho.com or ping him on Twitter if you have any questions about the event. Other than that, bring your questions, comments, and concerns down to General Assembly this Thursday.

Also, go download Riak.

The Basho Team
